import { MdxLayout } from "@/components/layout/layout";
import { SizingTokens } from "./sizing-tokens";
import { SizingTailwind } from "./sizing-tailwind";

export const metadata = {
  title: "Sizings",
};

export default ({ children }) => (
  <MdxLayout metadata={metadata}>{children}</MdxLayout>
);

## Tokens

<SizingTokens />

## Usage in CSS

Whenever you want to apply this style, you can use the corresponding variable.

```CSS
.myClass {
    width: var(--sizing-xs);
}
```

## Usage with TailwindCSS

Whenever you want to use a sizing from Grapes with TailwindCSS, you can use the corresponding keys.

Example with width:

<SizingTailwind />

See documentation from TailwindCSS: [https://tailwindcss.com/docs/width](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/width).
